## Monitoring Tips

1. **Set up notifications**: Go to GitHub Settings ‚Üí Notifications to configure workflow failure alerts
2. **Watch the repository**: Click "Watch" ‚Üí "All Activity" to get notified of all workflow runs
3. **Slack/Discord integration**: Use GitHub Apps to send workflow notifications to your team chat
4. **Email digests**: Configure weekly digest emails for workflow summaries

---

**Note**: Badges will only show status after the first workflow run. The workflows will run automatically based on their triggers (push, PR, schedule, etc.).
